Title: AN ACT TO AMEND CERTAIN ITEMS AND TO INSERT OTHERS UNDER SECTION ONE PARAGRAPH A, AND TO AMEND SECTION THREE OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED FORTY.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 474, June 17, 1939 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND CERTAIN ITEMS AND TO INSERT OTHERS UNDER SECTION ONE PARAGRAPH A, AND TO AMEND SECTION THREE OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED FORTY.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. Items 11 under Albay; 22, 25, and 31 under Bulacan ; 2 and 5 under Marinduque ; 8 and 33 under Nueva Ecija ; 46 under Pampanga ; 80, 81, 92, 93, 116, and 134 under Pangasinan ; and 8 and 21 under Tayabas, of section one paragraph A of Commonwealth Act Numbered two hundred forty are amended so as to read as follows:

Section 2. Items to be known as items 22(a) and 31(a) under Bulacan ; 92(a), 93(a), 134(a) and 134(b) under Pangasinan, are inserted in section one, paragraph A, of Commonwealth Act Numbered Two hundred forty to read as follows:

Section 3. Section three of Commonwealth Act Numbered Two hundred forty is amended to read as follows:
"Section 3. All balances of the appropriations made by this Act remaining unexpected on December thirty-first, nineteen hundred and forty, shall revert to the Philippine Coconut Oil Trust Fund and thereafter shall not be available for expenditure except upon appropriation by the National Assembly.ℒαwρhi৷
Section 4. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, June 17, 1939. with the exception of the following items: Section 1 : Albay, Item 11 : Bulacan, Items 22, 25 and 31: Pangasinan, Item 134; Section 2; Bulacan, Items 22(a) and 31(a) ; Pangasinan, Items 134(a) and 134(b).
